definition: thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)

first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: Objective To explore the therapeutic effect of sclerema neonatorum with thyroxine.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察甲状腺素治疗新生儿硬肿症的疗效。

sentences.english: From its location in the neck, the thyroid secretes hormones that affect metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 位于颈部的甲状腺分泌甲状腺素影响机体的新陈代谢。

sentences.english: To the patients using phenytoin sodium, it normally does not need to add thyroxin.
sentences.chinese: 应用苯妥英钠治疗癫痫的病人一般不需加用甲状腺素。

sentences.english: Hair gloss largely depends on the role of thyroid hormone inside body.
sentences.chinese: 头发的光泽度很大程度取决于体内甲状腺素的作用。

sentences.english: AIM To evaluate the effects of low - dose thyroxine in the treatment of cirrhosis with ascites.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察甲状腺素治疗肝硬化的近期疗效。

sentences.english: Hypothyroidism is completely treatable in many patients simply by taking a small pill of thyroxine once a day.
sentences.chinese: 很多患者每天服用一次甲状腺素片就可完全控制甲减。

sentences.english: Conclusion The patients should be managed by maintenance of thyroxine therapy.
sentences.chinese: 结论该征宜以甲状腺素终生替代治疗。

sentences.english: Is lower thyroid activity linked to longevity?
sentences.chinese: 降低甲状腺素有助于长寿？

definition: endocrine gland/gland producing internal secretion, e.g. hormone
testosterone/also written 睾甾酮[gao1 zai1 tong2]
anabolism (biology)/constructive metabolism (using energy to make proteins etc)/assimilation
